english.segment1: I feel the wind blow, does anyone know?. Who it is breathing, sending us hope
english.segment2: [Chorus]. I see the sun I found warmth, I found warmth in its light. Just like Your eyes I found grace, I found grace in your sight. Someday I'll go, I will see Your face. I will let go of these eyes of faith.
english.segment3: Here in the valley, a little confused. I look to the mountains, my help comes from You
english.segment5: The clouds roll into my life. And they remind of how You'll meet me in the sky. I feel the wind blow, does anyone know?. Under those clouds, oh where did we go?
